\chapter{Conclusion}\label{ch:conclusion}
\thispagestyle{empty}

Something like....


This PhD aimed to blah blah

SCS was idenitified as most appropriate SC resource and a large, linked health and social care dataset was created. 

Validation of the social care aspect was conducted via a second side-project which found (Renfrew)

Mulitmorbidity, along with age, was shown to have a strong relationship with receipt of social care. This has not been empirically shown before. 

Increasing severity of multimorbidity and social care use were shown to be associated with increased probabilities of unplanned hospital admission, although models showed a poorer fit to data. 

Further research is required to more accurately describe variations in the level of social care at the local authority level.
